TextView.android:text: Hackers are essential to secure computer systems from intrusion – as increased internet usage has resulted in increased security threats.

The Hacking Workshop will ready you for the Information Security Industry with technical training on cyber security. Live hacking sessions will allow in-depth understanding of computer server and network systems – which is essential for formulating strategies for improved security. Techfest brings you Hack-Tricks workshop, teaching you ethical hacking.
